MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 and LL27 postcode areas of Conwy and Trefriw, affecting properties in Conway Road, Bryn Morfa and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.02pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.00pm on 23rd April 2021.
